summary: Iteration 33 - Phase A Foundation Testing Complete. All 20 backend tests passed (100%). Frontend UI verified - Service Catalogue page loads with 14 services, navigation link visible, Cancel/Archive order functionality working correctly.
critical_code_review_comments: Service Catalogue page correctly displays 14 services (13 seeded + 1 test service)
Service Catalogue navigation link visible in admin header at /admin/services
Service search and filtering works correctly
Service details modal shows all service information including documents generated
Add/Edit service modals work with tabs (Basic Info, Pricing, Delivery)
DELETE endpoint correctly returns 405 with message about immutable records
Cancel/Archive dialog shows proper explanation and requires reason
Orders Pipeline shows status counts with visual emphasis on stages with orders
Order detail modal shows Customer, Service, Dates with tabs (Details, Documents, Timeline)
seed_data_creation: Test service TEST_SERVICE_001 created during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Phase A Foundation testing complete. Key features verified: 1) Service Catalogue CRUD at /admin/services with 13+ seeded services, 2) Service categories/pricing models/delivery types dropdowns, 3) Cancel/Archive order functionality replacing DELETE (405 response), 4) Orders Pipeline with status counts and visual emphasis, 5) Order detail modal with Cancel/Archive options. Document generator is MOCKED - produces text/XML files.

service_crud.details: Create, update, activate, deactivate all working

public_services.details: Returns active services without sensitive fields

delete_returns_405.details: Returns 405 with message about immutable records

cancel_order.details: Requires reason, only for unpaid orders

archive_order.details: Requires reason, works for any order

unarchive_order.details: Restores archived order to active pipeline

orders_pipeline.details: Returns orders and counts by status

service_catalogue_ui.details: Page loads at /admin/services, navigation link visible, search/filter works, modals work

cancel_archive_ui.details: Dialog shows proper message about immutable records, Cancel and Archive buttons present

mocked_apis_list: Document generation (MOCK - produces text/XML files with DRAFT watermark)
